if use_attention:
            assert exists(attention_heads) and exists(attention_features)
            self.attention = EinopsToAndFrom(
                "b c l",
                "b l c",
                Attention(
                    features=channels,
                    num_heads=attention_heads,
                    head_features=attention_features,

            )
